name: Hyper Seagull Skeet Shooting
description:
Hate seagulls? Skeet shoot them.

Hyper Seagull Skeet Shooting is the best way to get revenge on pesky seagulls. Tired of them waking you up early in the morning? Do they poop all over your car after you’ve just cleaned it? Sick of seagulls swooping you trying to steal your lunch?

Take revenge and blast as many as you can and go for the Hyper Seagull Skeet Shooting world record.

• Addictive hyper skeet shooting gameplay
• Timing is everything, test your skills!
• Fast paced reactions gameplay, Tap left or right of screen - BANG
• The perfect homage to 1980s arcade skeet shooting sports games
• Addictive one more go gameplay
• World Record mode - are you the number one player in the world?
• Extreme mode - see how many you can shoot in a row.
• HD graphics
